hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa’eed Al-Khudri that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever fasts one day in the cause of Allah, Allah will keep the Fire away from his face the distance of seventy autumns (years) for that day.”

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي صِيَامِ يَوْمٍ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: Fasting one day in the cause of Allah
